statements: DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_quantity < 10 AND part_price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_id = 100 AND part_quantity < 10;
DELETE FROM spare_parts_inventory WHERE part_category = 'Engine' AND part_price > 500.00;
DELETE FROM vehicle_parts WHERE part_name = 'Engine Oil';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE part_id = 101 AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE manufacturer = 'Ford' AND year < 2010;
DELETE FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplies';
